data.title: Marriage. Chapter 1.
data.meta_description: Read Marriage.   Chapter 1.  from the story A Princess Wish (RIVAMIKA) by loopyloostory with 635 reads. HERE ANOTEHR NEW RIVAMIKA BOOK
data.text:
HERE ANOTEHR NEW RIVAMIKA BOOK

HOPE YOU ENJOY

PLEASE VOTE

WHAT THE BOOK ABOUT ....

Mikasa and Farlan are siblings and they both from a royal family, they know as prince farlan and princess mikasa but they not as happy as the king would tell others. After mikasa lost her family she was forced to stay with the king and become a princess so was farlan but one day he ran away unknown to where from anyone important so mikasa was once again alone.

After mikasa gets told she has to get married in two years with any soldier she wants but if she docents pick someone she will be forced to marry one her grandpa picks and she knew the man will be a monster so mikasa runs to join the Survey courts as she always wanted to go and she meets new friends and meets the humanity strongest soldier Levi who catch her interests but she also meets an old face.

A LONG LONG TIME AGO THERE LIVED A HANDSOME PRINCE WITH A LOVING HEART. THE KINDOM LOVED THE PRINCE HE WAS SO KING AND HE ALWAYS HELPED WHEN HE CAME INTO TOWN TO VIST HE DIDNT SEE ANYONE AS LESS THEN EQUAL BUT HIS DAD THE KING WAS MEAN AND AN HORRIBLE KING TO ALL. THE PRINCE HAD A OLDER BROTHER BUT WHEN THEY WERE KIDS HE WAS TAKEN ON HIS WAY BACK FROM A TRIP FOR HIS PRINCE DUTIES. SO THE PRINCE MOSTLY WENT TO TOWN AS HE FELT HAPPY THERE INSTEAD AT HOME INE THE HUGE LONELY CASTEL.

ONE DAY A FRIEND OF THE KING GAVE THE PRINCE A GIFT FOR HIS BIRTHDAY AS A SHOW OF FAIT THE TO THE PRINCE WHEN HE BECOMES KING. THE PRINCE OPENED THE BOX TO FIND A RARE BEAUTY SLAVE. THE KING WAS SHOCKED AND ANGRY HE PICKED THE WOMEN OUT OF THE BOX AND PLACED HER ON THE GROUND BEFORE WRAPPING HIS COAT AROUND HER. THE PRINCE WAS MAD BUT HIS FARTHER PUNISHED HIM FOR CARING OVER A SLAVE.

THE PRINCE KEPT THE SLAVE BUT TREATED HER LIKE A HUMAN AND MADE HER A LITTLE FREE. HE COULDNT SET OF FREE AS HIS FARTHER WOULD JUST TAKE HER OR KILL HER SO HE JUST PROTECTED HER. AS THE YEARS WENT ON THE PRINCE AND THE SLAVE FELL IN LOVE, HE EVEN WAS GOING TO MARRY HER BUT THE KIND DIDNT AGREE AND FORCED THEM TO STOP.

WITH THE HELP OF THE TWON THE PRINCE AND THE SLAVE GOT MARRIED WITHOUT ANYONE FINDING OUT AND RAN AWAY TO A SMALL CABIN IN THE WOODS. THEY HAD A HANDSOME SON THAT STOOD OUT BY HIS PRETTY FACE CALLED FARLAN. THEY HAD A LITTLE GIRL WITH RARE BEAUTY LIKE HER MOTHER CALLED MIKASA. THEY CHILDREN WAS FOUR YEARS APART.

ONE DAY THE KING MEN AND MADE A DEAL WITH THE PRINCE SAYING IF THEY GAVE FARLAN TO THE KING TO TAKE OVER HIM ONE DAY THEY LET THEM ALL LIVE. THE PRINCE WANTING HIS CHILDREN TO LIVE HE AGREED AND THEY TOOK FARLAN AWAY WHEN HE WAS SIX TO THE KING. MIAKSA OFTEN SNEEK INTO THE CASTEL TO SEE HER BROTHER AND THEY STAYED CLOSE. BUT WHEN HER PARENTS FOUND OUT THEY HID MIKASA AWAY SCARED PEOPLE WOULD TAKE HER FOR HER RAER BEAUTY AND TRY TO SELL HER FOR MONEY.

YEARS LATER WHNE MIKASA BECAME EIGHT THE KING MEN CAME AGAIN AND THE KING WANTED THE PRINCE WIFE SO THE KING COULD HAVE SOME FUN. THE PRINCE FOUGHT HARD BUT HIS WIFE DIED BUT THE KINGS HAND AS SHE DIDNT COME. THE PRINCE RAN AWAY WITH MIKASA AGAIN AND PROTECTED HER FROM BAD GUYS WHO WANTED HER FOR HER RARE BEAUTY. MIKASA STARTED TO LOSE HER GLOW BUT SHE WAS STILL PRETTY JUST NOT HAPPY. ONE DAY WHEN HER AND THE PRINCE WAS OUT SHOPPING A OLD LADY WAS ROBBED AND THE PRINCE HELPED STOP HIM BUT MIKASA WAS TAKEN. THE PRINCE WENT AFTER THEM BUT BEFORE THEY PUT MIKASA IN THE CART SHE SAW THE LEADER STAB HER DAD AND SAW HIM DIE.
